Links

A few links that I find useful [in progress].


Research Programming Misc

Research

site

what is it

http://mitgcm.org/

MIT General Circulation Model news, information, source code, and documentation. 

https://github.com/NOAA-GFDL/MOM6-examples/wiki

Home page for the GFDL Modular Ocean Model (MOM6), includes source code, installation instructions, and examples. 

http://gifmaker.org/

A useful site for creating GIFs from a series of images (for animation purposes).

https://convertio.co/gif-mp4/

GIF to mp4 converter.

Programming

https://jekyllrb.com/

Jekyll software for website building.  

Misc

http://weathertank.mit.edu/links/projects

A useful site containing rotating tank experiments (useful for presentations!).
